data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 1, In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim needs to be cautious. Mainz have an attacking throw-in.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 7, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Edimilson Fernandes (Mainz) strikes at Opel Arena but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann waits before resuming play because Diadie Samassekou for Hoffenheim is still down.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 12, Sascha Stegemann signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Mainz's half.
Mainz pushes forward through Jean-Paul Boetius, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 14, Mainz are coming forward and Jean-Philippe Mateta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 17, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 20, Hoffenheim's Diadie Samassekou goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Hoffenheim.
Mainz's Edimilson Fernandes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mainz are caught offside.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Robin Quaison scores to make it 1-0 at Opel Arena.
Jean-Paul Boetius with an assist there.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 38, Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Hoffenheim's Christoph Baumgartner breaks free at Opel Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sascha Stegemann awards Mainz a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Mainz to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 44, Sascha Stegemann signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Mainz's half.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
Hoffenheim's Ihlas Bebou is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Sascha Stegemann will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Hoffenheim drive upfield and Christoph Baumgartner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mainz defender.
The first half has been concluded at Opel Arena.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Mainz have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Mainz.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Mainz throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
In the minute 53, Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 54, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Skov is replacing Florian Grillitsch for Hoffenheim at Opel Arena.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 56, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
Andrej Kramaric for Hoffenheim drives towards goal at Opel Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 60, Ihlas Bebou of Hoffenheim gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sascha Stegemann awards Mainz a goal kick.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ihlas Bebou grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Opel Arena.
In the minute 62, That's a fine assist from Ryan Sessegnon.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 65, Mainz's Jeremiah St. Juste gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hoffenheim defender.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Mainz.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Sascha Stegemann signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Mainz's half.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 70, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
The home team have replaced Levin Oztunali with Jonathan Michael Burkardt. This is the first substitution made today by Jan Moritz Lichte.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
In the minute 72, Mainz push upfield but Sascha Stegemann quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Hoffenheim.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 77, Ihlas Bebou (Hoffenheim) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Sascha Stegemann awards Mainz a goal kick.
The away team replace Ihlas Bebou with Munas Dabbur.
In the minute 77, Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's third substitution at Opel Arena with Sebastian Rudy replacing Christoph Baumgartner.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a second substitution, with Pierre Kunde replacing Edimilson Fernandes.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 79, Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a third substitution, with Karim Onisiwo replacing Robin Quaison.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) is red-carded and dismissed.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 85, Free kick Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Mainz make their fourth substitution with Kevin Stoger replacing Jean-Paul Boetius.
In the minute 86, Aaron Martin is on a sub for Daniel Brosinski for Mainz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Hoffenheim.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Mainz's Leandro Martins gets in a shot on goal at Opel Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Mainz push forward at Opel Arena and Jonathan Michael Burkardt gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hoffenheim defence.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Mainz.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Mainz throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Throw-in high up the field for Mainz in Mainz.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Opel Arena. The final score is 1-1.
The away team have replaced Andrej Kramaric with Mijat Gacinovic. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
